title: IM DONE WITH AFKERS AND INTERS
body: Litterally every single game ONLY IN RANKED GAMES  do i get inters, afkers, and trolls im sick of it i went  from gold 4 to silver 1 cuz of non stop trollls whyyyy

replies.body: What are you casul? Like the idea though, anyway you shoulda known when to stop on your gambling spree, we got plat players trying to demote back to gold because it's unfun, so I don't blame you for getting upset being paired with a bunch of inexperienced players as much as you do because they have the same mmr as you do upon 1st time ranked,It's a toxic unfun environment for newcomers and experienced players trapped by the newcomers, an elo hell at low elo, with a flurry of some of the examples you've said appear in thine ranked a lot.
